metadata.dc:author: Méndez-Cendón, J C
metadata.dc:description: We review the current state in literature of the use of magnetic resonance spectroscopy in the assessment and characterization of cerebral astrocytomas. Special attention will be paid to the presurgical grading of astrocytomas and to the role of spectroscopy in differentiating these tumors from other neoplastic and nonneoplastic brain lesions.
metadata.dc:title: Aplicaciones clínicas de la espectroscopía de protón por resonancia magnética in vivo en el estudio de los astrocitomas: estado actual.
[Clinical applications of in vivo proton magnetic resonance spectroscopy in the study of astrocytomas: state of the art].
